properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the Name of Jesus Every knee shall bow, Every tongue confess Him King of glory now; ’Tis the Father’s pleasure We should call Him Lord, Who from the beginning Was the Mighty Word.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}At His voice creation Sprang at once to sight: All the angel faces, All the hosts of light, Thrones and dominations, Stars upon their way, All the heav’nly orders, In their great array.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Humbled for a season, To receive a Name From the lips of sinners Unto whom He came, Faithfully He bore it Spotless to the last, Brought it back victorious, When from death He passed;{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bore it up triumphant, With its human light, Through all ranks of creatures, To the central height; To the throne of Godhead, To the Father’s breast, Filled it with the glory Of that perfect rest.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Name Him, brothers, name Him, With love strong as death, But with awe and wonder, And with bated breath; He is God the Savior, He is Christ the Lord, Ever to be worshiped, Trusted, and adored.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers, this Lord Jesus Shall return again, With His Father’s glory, With His angel train; For all wreaths of empire Meet upon His brow, And our hearts confess Him King of glory now.{/lang-eng}
